brokers.title: Broker Connections
brokers.description: Automatically sync your trades from your broker
brokers.noConnectionsDescription: Connect your broker to automatically import your trades
brokers.connectBrokerDescription: Enter your API credentials to connect your broker account
brokers.apiKeyHelp: You can generate your API keys in your Tradovate account settings. Make sure you have the 'API Access' add-on enabled.
brokers.ibkrStep1: Log in to IBKR Account Management
brokers.ibkrStep2: Go to Reports ‚Üí Flex Queries ‚Üí Trade Confirmation Flex Query ‚Üí Create
brokers.ibkrStep3: Configure the query with all trade fields and note the Query ID
brokers.ibkrStep4: Go to Settings ‚Üí Flex Web Service and generate a token
brokers.ibkrTutorialTitle: üìñ How to get your IBKR credentials?

ibkrTutorial.step1Title: Log in to the IBKR portal
ibkrTutorial.step1Desc: Access your Interactive Brokers account via the Client Portal.
ibkrTutorial.step2Desc: In the main menu, navigate to the flexible reports section.
ibkrTutorial.step3Desc: Click the '+' or 'Create' button to create a new 'Trade Confirmation' type query.
ibkrTutorial.step3Item2: Give your query a name (e.g., 'Trading Journal Sync')
ibkrTutorial.step3Item3: Select XML as the output format
ibkrTutorial.step4Desc: Select all necessary fields for trade import:
ibkrTutorial.step5Title: Save and note the Query ID
ibkrTutorial.step5Desc: After saving, IBKR will assign you a unique number (Query ID).
ibkrTutorial.step5Note: The Query ID is a 6-digit number. Write it down carefully!
ibkrTutorial.step6Desc: Go back to your account settings to enable the API.
ibkrTutorial.step7Desc: Click 'Generate Token' to create your API access key.
ibkrTutorial.step7Warning: The token is only displayed once! Copy it immediately.

cgv.title: Terms of Sale
cgv.description: These terms of sale govern the use of Trading Journal's paid services.

article1.title: Article 1 - Purpose
article1.content: These Terms of Sale define the rights and obligations of the parties in the context of the online sale of services offered by Trading Journal.

article2.title: Article 2 - Pricing
article2.content: The prices of our services are indicated in euros, including all taxes. Trading Journal reserves the right to modify its prices at any time, it being understood that the price displayed at the time of order will be the only one applicable to the Customer.

article3.title: Article 3 - Payment
article3.content: Payment is due immediately upon order. The Customer can make payment by credit card. Payments made by the Customer will only be considered final after actual receipt of the amounts due.

article4.title: Article 4 - Subscriptions
article4.content: Subscriptions are concluded for the duration chosen by the Customer (monthly, quarterly, semi-annual or annual). They are automatically renewed at the end of each period, unless cancelled by the Customer before the due date.

article5.title: Article 5 - Right of withdrawal
article5.content: In accordance with Article L221-28 of the Consumer Code, the right of withdrawal cannot be exercised for contracts for the supply of digital content not provided on a tangible medium whose execution has begun with the consumer's agreement.

article6.title: Article 6 - Termination
article6.content: The Customer can terminate their subscription at any time from their personal space. Termination takes effect at the end of the current subscription period.

article7.title: Article 7 - Liability
article7.content: Trading Journal cannot be held responsible for direct or indirect damages caused to the Customer or third parties due to the use of the services. The tool is provided for informational purposes and does not constitute investment advice.

article8.title: Article 8 - Applicable law
article8.content: These Terms of Sale are governed by French law. In case of dispute, French courts will have sole jurisdiction.

cgu.title: Terms of Use
cgu.description: These terms of use govern access to and use of the Trading Journal website.

article1.title: Article 1 - Acceptance of terms
article1.content: Access to and use of the Trading Journal website are subject to acceptance and compliance with these Terms of Use. By using the site, you unreservedly accept these terms.

article2.title: Article 2 - Description of services
article2.content: Trading Journal is a web application allowing users to track and analyze their trading performance. The service includes trade import, journal management, statistics display and other related features.

article3.title: Article 3 - Registration
article3.content: Use of the services requires creating an account. The user agrees to provide accurate information and maintain the confidentiality of their credentials. They are responsible for all activities carried out from their account.

article4.title: Article 4 - Personal data
article4.content: Trading Journal collects and processes personal data in accordance with GDPR. Imported trading data remains the property of the user and can be deleted at any time from the personal space.

article5.title: Article 5 - Intellectual property
article5.content: All elements of the Trading Journal website (texts, graphics, software, etc.) are protected by intellectual property law. Any reproduction or representation, in whole or in part, is prohibited without prior authorization.

article6.title: Article 6 - User conduct
article6.content: The user agrees to use the service in accordance with its intended purpose. It is forbidden to attempt unauthorized access to systems, disrupt the service's operation or use it for illegal purposes.

article7.title: Article 7 - Risk warning
article7.content: Trading involves significant risks of capital loss. Trading Journal is a tracking tool and does not provide any investment advice. Trading decisions remain the sole responsibility of the user.

article8.title: Article 8 - Modification of terms
article8.content: Trading Journal reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Users will be informed of significant changes. Continued use of the service after modification constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

mentions.title: Legal Notice
mentions.description: Mandatory legal information concerning the Trading Journal website.

editor.title: Website editor
editor.name: Trading Journal
editor.address: 39 Chemin des Fins Nord, 74000 Annecy, France

director.title: Publication director
director.content: The publication director is the legal representative of the sole proprietorship.

intellectual.title: Intellectual property
intellectual.content: All content on the Trading Journal website (texts, images, videos, logos, etc.) is protected by copyright. Any reproduction or representation, in whole or in part, of the site or any of its elements, without express authorization, is prohibited.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: The site uses essential cookies for the application to function (session, user preferences). No advertising cookies are used. By continuing to browse, you accept the use of these cookies.

gdpr.title: Data protection (GDPR)
gdpr.content: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify, delete and port your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us at the address indicated above.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.content: Subscription prices (Monthly ‚Ç¨10, Quarterly ‚Ç¨20, Biannual ‚Ç¨50, Annual ‚Ç¨70) are subject to change. Active subscriptions keep their current rate until the next renewal. All prices include VAT.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question, suggestion or problem? Feel free to contact us.

success.title: Message sent!
success.description: We have received your message and will respond as soon as possible.

error.title: Send error
error.description: An error occurred while sending. Please try again or contact us directly by email.

coach.title: AI Coach
coach.subtitle: Your personal trading assistant
coach.welcomeDescription: I can analyze your performance, give you personalized advice and help you improve your trading.

suggestionPrompts.analyzeStats: Can you analyze my trading statistics and give me an overview of my performance?
suggestionPrompts.improveTips: What tips can you give me to improve my trading results?
suggestionPrompts.mistakesHelp: What are the most common mistakes I make and how can I avoid them?

feedback.description: Share your suggestions, report a bug or give us your opinion.

feedback.successDescription: Thank you for your feedback, we will review it carefully.
feedback.errorDescription: Unable to send feedback. Please try again.

pricing.title: Simple and transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that suits you. All plans include a 7-day free trial.
pricing.trialInfo: 7-day free trial, no commitment. Credit card required. Cancel anytime.
pricing.pricesMayChange: Prices are subject to change. Active subscriptions keep their current rate.
pricing.errorLoadingPlans: Unable to load plans. Please try again.
pricing.faq1Answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings. You'll keep access until the end of your billing period.
pricing.faq2Question: What happens after the free trial?
pricing.faq2Answer: If you don't want to continue, cancel before the 7 days are up. Otherwise, your card will be automatically charged according to your chosen plan.
pricing.faq3Answer: Yes, you can change plans anytime. The change will take effect on your next billing period.
